name: Area Alert Mek - Ousia
description:
After your opponent plays 3 Action Cards: Deal 1 Cryo DMG.
When taking DMG from a character with Arkhe: Pneuma: Cancel this effect.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your opponent plays 3 Action Cards:</color> Deal 1 $[K101].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When taking DMG from a character with {SPRITE_PRESET#3505}Arkhe: Pneuma:</color> Cancel this effect.
